text: Hello?
Hello
How is your day going today?
It was a busy day at work today.  Are you ready for the three day weekday?
Oh of course labor day weekend is always a fun holiday. Do you usually donate to charities?
I don't much.  I do donate clothing and things that I don't need anymore.
Oh that\'s nice of you, have you heard of "Save the Children\'?
Yes.  I have seen many commercials on TV about this charity.  Do you donate to this charity?
Yes, I am today and was wondering would you like to donate to it also with the funds you get for this task?
I really can't. I am working hard on Mturks to make extra money.  I am so low on funds and so right now would be a good time to donate to this charity.
I understand but you dont have to donate a large amount, it's for a good cause. You can start off with donating $0.50?
I can do $0.25 today.
That's fine too, it will be very appreciated.
Yes then I'll do that amount.  It's for a good cause
Thank you, so im go make it clear you want to donate $0.25 correct?
Yes that is right.
Ok cool, whats your plans for Labor day?
Very busy.  I am in charge of my sister in law's baby shower, so I'll be finishing plans for her baby shower on Sunday.
Sounds like fun, have a great time with the baby shower and it was great speaking with you.
Great! Thank you/
